charges.charge_description: Count 1-36 CFr 4.22(b)(3)-Failing to maintain that degree of control of a motor vehicle necessary to avoid danger to person, property or wildlife. Count 2-36 CFR 4.2 Incorp. (VA 46.2-300)-No vehicle license plates displayed Count 3-36 CFR 4.2 Incorp. (VA 46.2-715)-No valid state operators'license while operating a motor vehicle

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to four days of incarceration; with credit for time served. Assessed $30 CVF. (-1)
